title: Deep Research
shortDescription: An OpenAI research assistant for generating in-depth reports using workflows or multi-agent architectures.
longDescription: Open Deep Research is an experimental, fully OpenAI research assistant that automates deep research and produces comprehensive reports on any topic. It offers two implementations—a structured workflow and a multi-agent system—each with unique strengths. Users can customize models, prompts, report structure, and search tools to fit their needs.
benefits: Automates deep research and report generation
OpenAI, Claud and fully customizable
Supports both workflow and multi-agent execution
Compatible with various search APIs and LLMs
Interactive UI and local/hosted deployment options

features.title: Graph-based Workflow Implementation
features.description: Follows a structured plan-and-execute process with human-in-the-loop, section-specific research, and customizable parameters for planning and writing.

features.title: Multi-agent Research System
features.description: Uses a supervisor-researcher architecture where each agent handles a report section in parallel, boosting efficiency and speed.

features.title: Flexible Search API Integration
features.description: Integrates with APIs like Tavily, Perplexity, Exa, ArXiv, PubMed, Linkup, and DuckDuckGo for high-quality web and academic search.

features.title: Model Agnostic Design
features.description: Supports a wide range of LLMs via the init_chat_model() API, including OpenAI, Anthropic, and OSS models like Groq's LLaMA 3.

features.title: Customizable Parameters
features.description: Users can tweak report structure, search depth, number of queries, and specific model behavior to control output quality.

useCases.title: Academic Research
useCases.description: Generate comprehensive literature reviews and academic-style reports with citations using ArXiv and PubMed integrations.

useCases.title: Business and Market Analysis
useCases.description: Conduct thorough market research reports using web search APIs like Tavily and Exa, tailored to industry-specific needs.

useCases.title: Internal Knowledge Base Generation
useCases.description: Automate the production of internal documentation or reports using structured research flows across various domains.

useCases.title: Rapid Prototyping of Research Workflows
useCases.description: Quickly iterate and test new research assistant workflows with LangGraph server, custom prompt flows, and multi-agent orchestration.

title: Local Deep Researcher
shortDescription: A fully local web research assistant powered by Ollama or LMStudio-hosted LLMs that generates markdown reports with iterative search and summarization.
longDescription: Local Deep Researcher is a fully local web research assistant that uses any LLM hosted by Ollama or LMStudio. It takes a topic and automatically generates a search query, retrieves web results, summarizes them, reflects on knowledge gaps, and refines the search over multiple cycles. The final result is a markdown report with citations, all generated locally and without requiring cloud-based LLM access.
benefits: Fully local research workflow—no cloud dependency
Customizable via environment variables and LangGraph Studio
Supports Ollama and LMStudio-hosted models
Iterative search and summarization for deeper insights
Markdown report with source citations and knowledge tracking

features.title: Local LLM Integration
features.description: Seamlessly integrates with local models hosted by Ollama or LMStudio, with configurable endpoints and model names.

features.title: Iterative Web Research
features.description: Performs a loop of search, summarization, reflection, and refined search to build a comprehensive understanding.

features.title: Search Tool Flexibility
features.description: Supports DuckDuckGo, SearXNG, Tavily, and Perplexity, with optional API key configuration.

features.title: Markdown Output with Citations
features.description: Generates a final report in markdown format with citations to all referenced sources.

features.title: LangGraph Studio UI
features.description: Includes a UI for configuring and visualizing the research flow, with environment variable and runtime controls.

useCases.title: Offline or Privacy-Sensitive Research
useCases.description: Ideal for users who require fully local processing due to privacy, confidentiality, or offline constraints.

useCases.title: Technical Documentation and Summarization
useCases.description: Automatically generates research summaries for complex topics with citations from trusted sources.

useCases.title: Academic and Scientific Exploration
useCases.description: Useful for exploring scholarly topics using DuckDuckGo or Perplexity, backed by customizable LLMs.

useCases.title: Developer Experimentation with LLM Workflows
useCases.description: Provides a hands-on example of orchestrating LLMs in a structured loop for iterative knowledge building.

title: Agentic Company Researcher
shortDescription: A multi-agent web platform that generates comprehensive company research reports using AI pipelines and real-time WebSocket updates.
longDescription: Agentic Company Researcher is a web-based platform that generates in-depth company research reports using a multi-agent pipeline. It combines data from various online sources, filters it using AI relevance scoring, and synthesizes it into a clean, downloadable markdown report. The tool features real-time progress updates via WebSocket, a modern React frontend, and a dual-model architecture leveraging both Gemini 2.0 Flash and GPT-4.1 for optimal content generation and formatting.
benefits: Automatically generates detailed research reports on any company
Real-time report generation with visual streaming of progress
Dual-model architecture for scalable synthesis and precise formatting
Modular backend with agentic architecture for flexibility and extensibility
Open-source and deployable locally or on cloud infrastructure

features.title: Multi-Source Research
features.description: Gathers data from company websites, financial documents, news sources, and industry analyses using automated pipelines.

features.title: AI-Powered Content Filtering
features.description: Implements Tavily's relevance scoring to curate and prioritize high-quality content for summarization.

features.title: Dual Model Architecture
features.description: Uses Gemini 2.0 Flash for high-context summarization and GPT-4.1-mini for markdown formatting and final report editing.

features.title: Real-Time WebSocket Communication
features.description: Streams progress updates such as curation, briefing generation, and report streaming to the React frontend.

features.title: Modular Agent Pipeline
features.description: Follows a structured research pipeline using agents like CompanyAnalyzer, FinancialAnalyst, NewsScanner, and more.

features.title: Modern React Frontend
features.description: Responsive UI that displays live updates, lets users download reports, and interact with agent-generated outputs.

useCases.title: Investor Research
useCases.description: Quickly generate detailed financial and market analysis on potential investment targets with synthesized reports.

useCases.title: Competitive Intelligence
useCases.description: Track market positioning, news coverage, and financial performance of competitors across industries.

useCases.title: Startup Discovery
useCases.description: Use the platform to analyze new and emerging startups based on public data and market trends.

useCases.title: Business Development
useCases.description: Equip sales or strategy teams with automated background briefs before client outreach or meetings.

title: AI Real Estate Agent
shortDescription: An AI-powered real estate assistant that searches properties across multiple sites and offers investment insights using Firecrawl and GPT.
longDescription: The AI Real Estate Agent automates property search and market analysis using Firecrawl's Extract endpoint and GPT-based AI insights. It helps users find properties that match their criteria, while also providing detailed analysis on price trends, rental yields, and investment opportunities. The tool aggregates listings from multiple real estate platforms and presents results through a clean, interactive Streamlit interface.
benefits: Find properties across multiple real estate platforms from a single interface
Get detailed property and location-level analysis with investment recommendations
Save time by automating and customizing your property search process
Secure and session-based API key handling for ease of use
Open-source and easily deployable with Streamlit

features.title: Smart Property Search
features.description: Uses Firecrawl's Extract endpoint to retrieve listings from multiple real estate platforms based on user-defined criteria.

features.title: Multi-Source Integration
features.description: Aggregates data from 99acres, Housing.com, Square Yards, Nobroker, and MagicBricks to ensure broad coverage.

features.title: Location Analysis
features.description: Provides local price trends, rental yield metrics, and investment potential insights to aid decision-making.

features.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
features.description: Uses GPT models to analyze properties and generate structured, intelligent suggestions.

features.title: Customizable Search
features.description: Users can filter search by city, property type (Flat/Individual House), category (Residential/Commercial), and budget.

features.title: User-Friendly Interface
features.description: Built with Streamlit to offer an intuitive and interactive UI for setting criteria and exploring results.

useCases.title: Real Estate Investment Research
useCases.description: Use AI to explore top-performing areas and make informed investment decisions with data-backed recommendations.

useCases.title: Home Buying Assistant
useCases.description: Helps individual buyers search for homes that match their criteria and offers AI-generated summaries for quick decision-making.

useCases.title: Real Estate Agent Tooling
useCases.description: Agents can use it to speed up client property searches, with aggregated data and summarized insights.

useCases.title: Rental Yield Analysis
useCases.description: Evaluate rental potential and long-term returns in selected locations with automated yield and trend analysis.

title: Intelligent Document Ingestion, Crawling & Semantic Search
shortDescription: A unified platform combining intelligent web crawling, document chunking, embedding, indexing, and semantic search to transform unstructured content into searchable knowledge.
longDescription: Ensar Web & Search is an end-to-end intelligent document and crawl platform that crawls websites, extracts and chunks text, generates OpenAI-compatible vector embeddings, and indexes them using DuckDB with high-performance vector similarity search (HNSW). It supports real-time job management, semantic search, tagging, fuzzy filtering, and document APIs via FastAPI. Designed for building knowledge bases from internal or external web content, it enables organizations to search by meaning, not just keywords.
benefits: Fully automated web crawling and ingestion pipeline
Chunked semantic indexing using OpenAI embeddings
Real-time semantic search over embedded content
Fuzzy tag search and full-text retrieval
Scalable, modular, and cloud-ready architecture
Monitor crawling and processing progress in real-time
Organize and categorize content with flexible tagging
Build searchable knowledge bases from web content
Find information based on meaning, not just keywords

features.title: Asynchronous Web Crawler
features.description: Discover and extract content from websites using a breadth-first search strategy with crawl4ai. Filters non-essential content for high-quality markdown output.

features.title: Chunking Engine
features.description: Uses LangChain text splitters to segment long-form content into semantically meaningful chunks with configurable overlap.

features.title: Semantic Vector Processing
features.description: Transforms content into 1536-dimension vector embeddings using LiteLLM (OpenAI-compatible), enabling powerful semantic similarity comparisons.

features.title: Vector Indexing & Similarity Search
features.description: Indexes vectors in DuckDB with HNSW (Hierarchical Navigable Small World) index for fast cosine similarity search.

features.title: Distributed Job Management
features.description: Manages crawl and indexing tasks asynchronously using Redis Queue (RQ) with built-in job tracking, status updates, and fault tolerance.

features.title: Tag and Domain Filtering
features.description: Supports both exact and fuzzy tag filtering using JSON-based filters and Levenshtein distance matching for flexible document discovery.

features.title: RESTful API with FastAPI
features.description: Provides endpoints for document search, retrieval, tag listing, and job monitoring with pagination and structured responses.

useCases.title: Enterprise Knowledge Search
useCases.description: Index internal wikis and documentation for employees to search semantically, reducing time spent navigating siloed resources.

useCases.title: Technical Documentation Search
useCases.description: Index and unify product, API, and support documentation for fast developer access to relevant topics using semantic matching.

useCases.title: Compliance Document Management
useCases.description: Crawl and semantically search legal and regulatory sites to build a compliance repository searchable by intent, not just keywords.

useCases.title: Research Knowledge Base
useCases.description: Aggregate research papers, journals, and publications into a semantic knowledge system for concept-based academic exploration.

useCases.title: AI Agent Knowledge Base
useCases.description: Feed AI agents with a dense vector-indexed corpus to enhance conversational understanding and domain-specific QA capabilities.

useCases.title: Educational Content Repository
useCases.description: Crawl and index online learning materials to enable students and educators to discover educational content by topic and concept.

useCases.title: Competitive Intelligence
useCases.description: Continuously crawl and index industry and competitor sites to build a semantic market intelligence dashboard.

title: Natural Language to SQL Generator
shortDescription: Convert plain English into SQL queries and run them securely against a MySQL database using FastAPI and LLMs.
longDescription: This solution enables users to generate and execute SQL queries by simply entering natural language questions. Built with FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and LangChain-integrated Ollama models (like DeepSeek or LLaMA), it dynamically introspects a MySQL schema and converts queries to SQL using prompt templates and a language model. It also executes those SQL queries securely and returns JSON-formatted results, making it ideal for data exploration apps, analytics dashboards, or internal tools.
benefits: Automates SQL generation from user-friendly natural language inputs
Supports real-time schema introspection from a MySQL database
Enables seamless execution and retrieval of query results
Uses LLMs like DeepSeek via Ollama for high-accuracy SQL translation
Exposes clean REST APIs for easy integration with frontend apps

features.title: Natural Language to SQL Translation
features.description: Converts user questions into SQL statements using LangChain prompt templates and an Ollama-hosted LLM.

features.title: Dynamic Schema Extraction
features.description: Automatically extracts database schema from MySQL using SQLAlchemy's inspection tools.

features.title: SQL Execution API
features.description: Runs raw SQL queries and returns results in JSON format through FastAPI endpoints.

features.title: CORS-Enabled API Server
features.description: Supports cross-origin requests, enabling integration with any frontend.

features.title: Prompt Engineering for SQL-Only Output
features.description: Uses a strict prompt template to ensure the language model returns only valid SQL syntax without explanations.

useCases.title: Internal BI Tooling
useCases.description: Enable business teams to explore database insights using plain English instead of writing SQL.

useCases.title: AI-Powered Dashboards
useCases.description: Integrate into a dashboard application to convert user questions into live queries on backend databases.

useCases.title: Data Exploration for Analysts
useCases.description: Let analysts query data more freely without needing to know SQL syntax.

useCases.title: Frontend-Backend Prototyping
useCases.description: Use this API as a backend engine to prototype data-driven applications quickly.
